section.p: Hand over any sealed letters that you have.
Yoritomo reads quickly, a derisive smile playing on his lips. ‘See this calligraphy?’ he snorts. ‘This is how I know that Kumonosu will never amount to anything. He writes with a barbarian’s hand!’
Your reward is not in the form of cash, which would be an insult to any proud Akatsurese knight. to see what your lord gives you.
